description: This column is about the voice that the brand uses to communicate with its audience. It includes the style, personality, and tone of the brand's messaging.
This column is about the tone that the brand uses in its communication. It likely includes information on the overall attitude, style, and personality that the brand conveys in its messaging.

This column is about the communication style of the brands featured on the e-commerce platform. It may include information on how the brand communicates with its customers, the tone of its messaging, and the overall style of communication used in its marketing and branding efforts.

This column is about defining the brand archetype of each brand in the e-commerce platform. Brand archetype is a concept in marketing and brand strategy that identifies a brand's personality and characteristics based on universal storytelling characters or models. Examples of brand archetypes include the Hero, the Rebel, the Sage, the Explorer, etc. Determining a brand's archetype helps shape its messaging, visual identity, and overall brand positioning to resonate with its target audience.

This column is about the category to which a brand belongs in the context of the e-commerce platform. It specifies the industry or type of products that the brand offers, allowing users to browse and filter brands based on categories such as clothing, electronics, beauty, home goods, etc.
This column is about differentiating the brands available on the e-commerce platform based on unique selling propositions or characteristics that set them apart from each other.

This column provides information about the market position of each brand within the e-commerce platform. It may include details such as whether the brand is positioned as high-end, affordable, luxury, trendy, eco-friendly, etc. This information helps in categorizing and displaying brands in a way that aligns with the platform's target audience and overall strategy.

description: This column is about providing a description of the logo associated with each brand in the e-commerce platform. It may include details about the logo design, symbolism, colors, or any other relevant information related to the brand's logo.
This column is about storing the URL links to the logos of different brands associated with the e-commerce platform.

This column is about the primary typography style that is associated with each brand in the e-commerce platform. It contains information regarding the font type, size, color, and any other stylistic elements related to typography that are used to represent a brand's visual identity.

examples: Helvetica Neue, 14px, #555555, used for subheadings in marketing materials
Roboto Light, 16px, #333333, recommended for body text in brochures

This column is about storing the name of different categories in the e-commerce platform.

description: This column is about storing the description of different categories available on the e-commerce platform. It provides details or information about the products or items that fall under a specific category to help users understand what each category offers.

This column is about storing the unique identifier (slug) for each category in the e-commerce platform. Slugs are typically used in URLs to provide a human-readable version of the category name for easy navigation and search engine optimization.
This column is about storing the unique key identifier for a product attribute schema in the public schema of the database.
This column is about storing the labels of the product attributes, which describe the characteristics or properties of products in the e-commerce platform.

This column is about the type of attribute that is associated with the product attribute schema in the e-commerce platform. It could include different types such as text, number, date, etc., defining the kind of data that can be stored for a specific product attribute.

examples: Please provide the weight of the product in kilograms.
Select the color that best represents the product.
Add the material composition of the product.
Insert the product dimensions in the format: Length x Width x Height.
Specify the country of origin for the product.
Indicate the recommended age group for using this product.
Upload high-quality images of the product from different angles.
Describe any special care instructions for maintaining the product.
Provide the warranty details for the product.
Include any certifications or safety standards met by the product.
Enter the maximum weight capacity the product can support.
Specify if batteries are required for the product and if they are included.
Add any assembly instructions or requirements for the product.
List the compatible accessories or related products for this item.
Indicate the scent or fragrance (if applicable) of the product.
Provide the expiration date or shelf life of the product.
Describe the product's unique selling points or key features.
Include any environmental impact details of the product.
Specify if the product is suitable for outdoor or indoor use.
Mention any known allergens present in the product.
description: This column is about providing help text or instructions for the product attribute schema in the e-commerce platform. It may include details on how to fill out or use specific attributes, helping users understand the purpose and usage of each attribute in the product catalog.
This column is about storing unique identifiers for each product catalog in the e-commerce platform.
This column is about storing the name of the product catalog in the e-commerce platform. It represents the title or the name used to identify the specific product catalog within the system.

description: This column is about storing the description of product catalogs in the e-commerce platform.
This column is a unique identifier or URL-friendly string for each product catalog. It is used for generating user-friendly URLs and organizing products within categories on the e-commerce platform.

This column is about storing the URLs of the images associated with the products in the e-commerce platform. These images are used to visually represent the products to users as they browse and make purchasing decisions.

description: This column is about storing the alternative text description for the images of products in the e-commerce platform. Alt text is used to provide a textual description of an image for users who are unable to see the image or for search engine optimization purposes.

This column is about storing the color identifier associated with each product image in the e-commerce platform. It is used to categorize and display product images based on their color variants, allowing users to easily identify and select products in their preferred colors.

This column is about storing the stock keeping unit (SKU) for the product variants in the e-commerce platform. SKUs are unique identifiers assigned to each product variant to track inventory and distinguish between different variations of the same product, such as size, color, or style.
This column is for storing the barcode of different product variants. Each product variant may have a unique barcode assigned to it for identification and tracking purposes.
This column is about storing the names of the products available on the e-commerce platform. Each entry in this column represents the name of a specific product that users can browse and purchase.

description: This column is for storing the meta title of the products in the e-commerce platform. It likely contains the title used for search engine optimization purposes to help improve the visibility and ranking of the product in search engine results.

description: This column is about storing meta descriptions for products in the e-commerce platform. Meta descriptions provide a brief summary or overview of the product's content, helping with search engine optimization and providing users with a preview of what the product is about.
This column is about storing the unique usernames associated with user profiles in the e-commerce platform.
This column is about storing the full name of the user's profile.
This column is about storing the URL of the avatar image associated with a user's profile in the e-commerce platform.
This column is about storing the website URLs of user profiles. Users may have a personal or business website associated with their profile in the e-commerce platform.
This column is about storing the unique identifier for each user in the authentication system.
This column is about storing the role of the users in the e-commerce platform. It likely defines the level of access and permissions that each user has within the system.
This column is about storing the email address of the users who have accounts on the e-commerce platform for authentication and communication purposes.

This column is about storing the encrypted password of users for authentication and security purposes. It is used to securely store and manage user passwords in a way that they cannot be easily accessed or decoded. This is crucial for safeguarding user accounts and protecting sensitive information.
This column is a token used for confirming the user's email address during the registration process. It is likely generated during the account creation and sent to the user's email for verification.
This column is used to store recovery tokens for users who need to reset their passwords or recover access to their accounts.
This column is for storing the token generated when a user requests to change their email address in the authentication system.
This column is about storing a token used for changing the user's email address.
This column is about storing the email addresses of users who have signed up to be on the waitlist for certain products in the e-commerce platform.
